betmc_feature_label_10@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Optimize the performance of Total Items Counter

betmc_feature_label_11@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Added a feature to display Arrow counter when holding Bows and Crossbows on the HUD screen

betmc_feature_label_1@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Removed the F8 button on the HUD screen (because it's useless)

betmc_feature_label_15@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Remove color_map (a few people have told me, it's too dazzling)

betmc_feature_label_2@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Added a toggle to show/hide skins on the start screen

betmc_feature_label_3@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Made transparent through binoculars and when wearing pumpkin

betmc_feature_label_4@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Added hiding enchant text line in HUD screen (Enable in config.json)

betmc_feature_label_5@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Change the wallpaper to Minecraft (If you want an Anime wallpaper, you need to install the Animation BG resource pack)

betmc_feature_label_16@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Update the Clock, Compass, Recovery Compass HUD items ID

betmc_feature_label_6@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Added the feature Unlocker Traders Village

betmc_feature_label_14@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Added the feature Exp Caculator [Base code by: Asaki Yuki]

betmc_feature_label_7@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Show the world folder (world ID) in the world list (Disable in config.json)

betmc_feature_label_13@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Show online players and network status in the server list

betmc_feature_label_8@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Minor bug fixes on the play screen

betmc_feature_label_9@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Fixed a minor bug in the settings screen in Minecraft version 1.21.60
Fixed some features with offset errors in the HUD screen when switching the keyboard to touch

betmc_feature_label_12@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Fixed a minor bug in the pause screen in minecraft version 1.21.60

betmc_feature_label_1@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Fixed bug in world template screen when clicking create world

betmc_feature_label_2@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Fix item id compass, clock, compass recovery changed to other item

betmc_feature_label_3@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Fixed the display of Item ID, Item ID Aux label

betmc_feature_label_6@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Redesign Accessibility, General, Accounts sections in the most compact way

betmc_feature_label_9@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Hidden settings background while in pregame

betmc_feature_label_7@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Added Gametag and login button at start screen

betmc_feature_label_8@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Added item steal button feature in chest (Thanks to Asaki Yuki for the source code)

betmc_feature_label_11@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Added Total Mainhand Item In Inventory (Thanks to Asaki Yuki for the source code)

betmc_feature_label_1@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Make the water surface transparent down to 35%%.

betmc_feature_label_2@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Cleared fog while underwater and lava

betmc_feature_label_3@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Leaves, vines and grass blocks have been fresher than usual

betmc_feature_label_4@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Added quick crafting button (only support for [classic ui])

betmc_feature_label_5@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Added inventory and chest mode [Auto move items, Auto drop items, Destroy item in creative mode]  (only support for [classic ui])

betmc_feature_label_6@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Background animation has been split from the main resource pack, creating its own background resource pack

betmc_feature_label_9@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Inventory hud has been changed to a new style (base code by: Asaki Yuki)

betmc_feature_label_7@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Inventory hud is now supported for mobile devices (Toggle show/hide)

betmc_feature_label_8@betmc_menu_common..$betmc_text: Added F1, F8 buttons for mobile devices

betmc_feature_label_10@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Force show export worlds button for mobile devices (in world setting)

betmc_feature_label_11@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Force show custom version world for all devices (in world setting)

betmc_feature_label_12@betmc_menu_common.$betmc_text: Force show vsync button for all devices (in game settings)
